s2.title: Status
s2.p: Schema is not supported in Xerces-C yet. However work is in progress to port the Schema Support from Xerces-J to Xerces-C.

We will first have a Schema Subset release in the summer, and then a full Schema PR (Proposed Recommendation) release in the fall. The Schema Subset release will have the following minimal Schema support:

ul.li: Partial Simple Type Support (Yes: atomic simple type. No: union and list)
Partial Complex Type Support (Yes: choice, sequence. No: group, all)
Primitive datatypes: string, boolean, decimal, binary

s2.p: Anything not mentioned above will be available in the Schema PR release later.

Please note that the dates are tentative and subject to change. There is a dependency on the Schema PR implementation in Xerces-J which is still under development, and a dependency on the status of Schema PR moving to Recommendation.
If anyone would like to volunteer to help out with the schema port, that would be great. Please post to Xerces-C-dev mailing list.
